title: Vector comparison - acceleration of four cyclists

Cars <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>, <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>, and <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></math> are moving along a straight track. The table indicates their velocities and accelerations at the same instant. Which car has the acceleration with the greatest magnitude?

topic.text: 1.1: Scalars and Vectors in One Dimension

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
